overview:
Patrick has worked in the IT industry for more than 15 years. Prior to joining Preview Networks Patrick worked in London on large training projects for Spring IT and in Denmark as system and network administration for Adnuvo (formerly called Codeministry) and with us.

Patrick holds a master degree in Economics Science and a Diploma of Advanced Studies in Econometrics from Bordeaux

University. Patrick activities involves overseeing Research and Development (R&D) activities, and formulating long-term visions and strategies at the officer level.

Patrick is also monitoring Preview Networks’ outsourcing and off-shoring development activities.
